name: hawaiian-lenilani-chatbot
description: AI Chatbot for Hawaiian businesses with authentic cultural integration

scripts.setup: npm run setup:python && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:python: python -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:rasa" "npm run dev:actions" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:python && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run train

author: LeniLani Consulting
